code: import axios from'axios';var API_URL='/api/plots';export var getAllPlots=function getAllPlots(_ref){var token=_ref.token;var authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);var headers={Authorization:authorization};return axios.get("".concat(API_URL),{headers:headers}).then(function(res){return res.data.plots;});};export var createPlot=function createPlot(_ref2){var token=_ref2.token,plot=_ref2.plot;var authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);var headers={Authorization:authorization};return axios.post("".concat(API_URL),plot,{headers:headers}).then(function(res){return res.data.createdPlot;});};export var updatePlot=function updatePlot(_ref3){var token=_ref3.token,plot=_ref3.plot;var authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);var headers={Authorization:authorization};var URL="".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(plot.id);return axios.put(URL,plot,{headers:headers}).then(function(res){return res.json();});};export var deletePlot=function deletePlot(_ref4){var token=_ref4.token,id=_ref4.id;var authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);var headers={Authorization:authorization};var URL="".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id);return axios.delete(URL,{headers:headers});};
